resources.string: Please display and read privacy policy!
Congratulations, your membership process has been completed successfully, please sign in.
Mac Address is not valid, Please check again.
Can not add new device to database!
New mac address is not valid!
Please enable your cellular device bluetooth!
The device named %s cannot be reached, its last lost location has been recorded.
The device is within the diameter given above.
Please wait, connecting to the device.
In order for the application to perform its main function, you need to grant Bluetooth & Nearby permissions.
Bluetooth & Nearby permissions have been denied, please provide these settings from the application permissions in the device settings.
Device tracking needs your permission to send you notifications from within the app.
Notification permission is denied, go to app settings for enabling.
If permission denied, please set from device app settings!

Allow Ivocabo to access your location to provide accurate information and improve your experience with our location-based services. We utilize location tracking to keep track of the last known location of the Ivocabo device even when it goes out of range. This helps us ensure that we can provide you with relevant notifications and updates when you are in proximity to the beacon. Rest assured that your location data will only be used within the app and will not be shared with any third parties. Your privacy and data security are our top priorities.

We need your permission because we need to monitor the connection between your phone and the Ivocabo device, even when the app is not in use or closed. This allows us to notify you when the connection with the Ivocabo device is lost and provide its last known location. By granting location permission, you can access the device\'s location information even if you miss the notification. Rest assured that we respect your privacy and ensure that your location data is used solely for these purposes. Your personal data will never be sold or shared for any purpose facilitating sale. For more information about how we handle your data, please review our privacy policy.
Allow Ivocabo to find and determine the relative position of nearby and Ivocabo devices?

A Bluetooth connection is required to connect to Ivocabo. Since this connection depends on your approval, we kindly ask you to enter the application information in the settings of your mobile phone and grant Bluetooth permissions manually.

You must allow this service to notify you of disconnections while tracking the Ivocabo device. We kindly request that you please go to the application information in your mobile phone settings and allow notifications under the permissions tab.

Notification Permission denied. You must allow this service to notify you of disconnections while monitoring the Ivocabo device. We kindly request that you please go to the application information in your mobile phone settings and allow notifications under the permissions tab.
